attributes.name: Property Listing
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Property Listing card for real estate information management in the Boxel framework. This card should handle residential and commercial property listings with detailed specifications, media galleries, virtual tours, and integration with MLS systems for real estate professionals and property managers.

## Core Fields

### Property Identification
- **listingId**: StringField - MLS or internal listing number
- **propertyType**: StringField with enum: "single-family", "condo", "townhouse", "multi-family", "commercial", "land", "industrial"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "coming-soon", "active", "under-contract", "pending", "sold", "withdrawn", "expired"
- **listingDate**: DateField - Date listed for sale/rent
- **daysOnMarket**: NumberField - Auto-calculated from listing date

### Location Information
- **address**: contains(PropertyAddress) - Full property address
- **neighborhood**: StringField - Neighborhood name
- **school District**: linksTo(SchoolDistrict) - School information
- **latitude**: NumberField - GPS coordinate
- **longitude**: NumberField - GPS coordinate
- **mapView**: contains(MapWidget) - Interactive map display
- **walkScore**: NumberField - Walkability rating
- **transitScore**: NumberField - Public transit access

### Property Details
- **bedrooms**: NumberField - Number of bedrooms
- **bathrooms**: NumberField - Full and half baths
- **squareFeet**: NumberField - Total living area
- **lotSize**: NumberField - Land area
- **yearBuilt**: NumberField - Construction year
- **stories**: NumberField - Number of floors
- **garage**: contains(GarageInfo) - Parking details
- **basement**: contains(BasementInfo) - Basement specifications

### Pricing Information
- **listPrice**: NumberField - Asking price
- **pricePerSquareFoot**: NumberField - Calculated price/sqft
- **previousPrice**: NumberField - If price changed
- **taxAssessment**: NumberField - Tax assessed value
- **propertyTaxes**: NumberField - Annual tax amount
- **hoaFees**: NumberField - Monthly HOA dues
- **rentPrice**: NumberField - If rental property
- **capRate**: NumberField - For investment properties

### Features & Amenities
- **interiorFeatures**: containsMany(StringField) - Interior amenities
- **exteriorFeatures**: containsMany(StringField) - Outdoor amenities
- **appliances**: containsMany(Appliance) - Included appliances
- **flooring**: containsMany(FlooringType) - Floor materials
- **heating**: StringField - Heating system type
- **cooling**: StringField - Cooling system type
- **utilities**: containsMany(Utility) - Available utilities
- **smartFeatures**: containsMany(SmartFeature) - Smart home tech

### Media & Virtual Tours
- **photos**: containsMany(PropertyPhoto) - High-res images
- **virtualTour**: contains(VirtualTour) - 3D walkthrough
- **videoTour**: contains(VideoField) - Video walkthrough
- **floorPlans**: containsMany(FloorPlan) - Layout diagrams
- **droneFootage**: contains(VideoField) - Aerial views
- **neighborhoodVideo**: contains(VideoField) - Area overview

### Listing Information
- **listingAgent**: linksTo(Agent) - Primary listing agent
- **listingOffice**: linksTo(Brokerage) - Listing brokerage
- **coListingAgent**: linksTo(Agent) - Co-listing agent
- **commission**: contains(CommissionStructure) - Agent compensation
- **showingInstructions**: MarkdownField - Access instructions
- **remarks**: MarkdownField - Public remarks
- **privateRemarks**: MarkdownField - Agent-only notes

### Showings & Offers
- **showings**: containsMany(Showing) - Scheduled showings
- **offers**: containsMany(Offer) - Received offers
- **openHouses**: containsMany(OpenHouse) - Scheduled events
- **favoriteCount**: NumberField - Times saved by users
- **viewCount**: NumberField - Listing views
- **inquiries**: containsMany(Inquiry) - Buyer questions

## Required Component Cards

### PropertyPhoto Card
Create a separate PropertyPhoto card with:
- **image**: contains(ImageField) - High-resolution photo
- **caption**: StringField - Photo description
- **room**: StringField - Room/area depicted
- **photoType**: StringField - Exterior, interior, aerial
- **isPrimary**: BooleanField - Main listing photo
- **order**: NumberField - Display sequence
- **photographer**: StringField - Photo credits
- **dateTaken**: DateField - Photo date

### Offer Card
- **offerAmount**: NumberField - Proposed purchase price
- **offerDate**: DateTimeField - When submitted
- **expirationDate**: DateTimeField - Offer deadline
- **buyer**: linksTo(Contact) - Buyer information
- **buyerAgent**: linksTo(Agent) - Buyer's representative
- **contingencies**: containsMany(Contingency) - Conditions
- **earnestMoney**: NumberField - Deposit amount
- **closingDate**: DateField - Proposed closing
- **status**: StringField - Active, accepted, rejected, countered

### OpenHouse Card
- **date**: DateField - Open house date
- **startTime**: TimeField - Begin time
- **endTime**: TimeField - End time
- **hostAgent**: linksTo(Agent) - Hosting agent
- **registrations**: containsMany(Visitor) - Visitor sign-ins
- **feedback**: containsMany(Feedback) - Visitor comments
- **refreshments**: BooleanField - Food/drinks provided
- **virtualOption**: contains(VirtualEventLink) - Online viewing

## Computed Fields Logic

### Price Per Square Foot
List Price / Square Feet = Price per square foot for comparisons.

### Monthly Payment Estimate
Calculate estimated mortgage payment based on price, down payment, and current rates.

### Investment Returns
For rental properties, calculate ROI, cap rate, and cash flow projections.

### Market Analysis
Compare to similar properties (comps) in the area for pricing insights.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design an engaging property showcase interface:

**Header Section**
- Property address prominently displayed
- Status badge (Active, Pending, Sold)
- Price in large, bold text
- Key stats: Beds, baths, sqft
- Save and share buttons
- Contact agent CTA

**Photo Gallery**
- **Main Gallery**:
  - Large primary photo
  - Thumbnail navigation
  - Full-screen mode
  - Photo count indicator
  - Virtual tour launcher
  
- **Interactive Features**:
  - Swipe/arrow navigation
  - Zoom capability
  - Photo captions
  - Download options

**Property Details Tabs**
- **Overview**: Key features and description
- **Details**: Comprehensive specifications
- **Location**: Map and neighborhood info
- **Schools**: District and nearby schools
- **History**: Price and tax history
- **Documents**: Disclosures and reports

**Feature Highlights**
- Icon-based feature grid
- Room-by-room breakdown
- Recent updates/renovations
- Energy efficiency ratings
- Special features callouts

**Map & Location**
- Interactive map with property pin
- Nearby amenities overlay
- Commute time calculator
- Street view integration
- Neighborhood boundaries

**Financial Information**
- Monthly payment calculator
- Tax history graph
- HOA fee breakdown
- Utility cost estimates
- Insurance estimates

### Fitted View Layout
- Primary photo thumbnail
- Address and price
- Beds/baths/sqft stats
- Status indicator
- Days on market
- Quick contact button

### Mobile Listing View
- Swipeable photo gallery
- Collapsible sections
- Click-to-call agent
- Easy sharing options
- Map directions

## Interactive Features

### Virtual Viewing
- 3D home tour navigation
- Dollhouse view
- Floor plan overlay
- Measurement tool
- VR headset support

### Communication Tools
- Schedule showing button
- Ask a question form
- Live chat with agent
- Video call touring
- Offer submission

### Search & Filter
- Advanced search criteria
- Map-based search
- Saved search alerts
- Similar properties
- Price drop notifications

## Styling Requirements
- Clean, modern real estate aesthetic
- High-quality photo display
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Fast loading optimization
- Print-friendly flyers
- ADA compliance
- Multi-language support
- Brand customization

## Validation Rules
- Address must be valid and unique
- Price must be greater than zero
- Required photos minimum (usually 1)
- Bedrooms/bathrooms non-negative
- Year built reasonable range
- Geographic coordinates valid
- MLS compliance rules
- Fair housing compliance

## Integration Points
- **MLS Systems**: IDX/RETS feeds
- **Real Estate Portals**: Zillow, Realtor.com
- **CRM Systems**: Real estate CRMs
- **Virtual Tour**: Matterport, iGuide
- **Photography**: Scheduling and delivery
- **Showing Services**: ShowingTime, etc.
- **Transaction Management**: Dotloop, DocuSign
- **Marketing**: Social media auto-post
- **Analytics**: Traffic and engagement
- **Mortgage Calculators**: Rate integration

## Business Logic Requirements
- Automatic MLS syndication
- Lead routing to agents
- Showing appointment scheduling
- Offer management workflow
- Comparative market analysis
- Price change history
- Commission calculations
- Escrow timeline tracking
- Document management
- Client portal access
- Marketing automation
- Performance analytics
- Compliance monitoring
- Fraud detection
